Row.Text: Adds [COLOR_FLOAT_SCIENCE]Icebreaker[ENDCOLOR] and [COLOR_FLOAT_GOLD]Nuclear Icebreaker[ENDCOLOR] units to the game

Makes [COLOR_LIGHTBLUE]ice passable[ENDCOLOR] (movement cost = 200).[NEWLINE][COLOR_RED]Submarines[ENDCOLOR] ignore ice movement costs.[NEWLINE][COLOR_FLOAT_SCIENCE]Icebreaker[ENDCOLOR] and [COLOR_FLOAT_GOLD]Nuclear Icebreaker[ENDCOLOR], as well as units combined with them, also ignore the cost of moving.[NEWLINE]Adds 2 Unique Unit to Canada.
